name: Wilson + Glimmer vs. Shrubbery
description:
The demo of Mender's Strife: An 8-Bit Fantasy and Took 2 Long Productions proudly present to you:

WILSON + GLIMMER VS. SHRUBBERY

Yes, that's right! Wilson has own game!

Journey through the "dangerous" Hearnwood along with Glimmer fighting monsters, gaining levels, fighting monsters, finding special treasures, fighting monsters, and fighting monsters (we did mention that right? There's a lot of that... sorry... not sorry...).

And did we mention the snark? We won't apologize for that either.

Anyway, please enjoy the game... thing... yeah. It's SUPER FUN!
